itemCV.about:
I'am software engeneer from Russia with 4+ year experience.
Currently work at Sibext as a Android Team Lead. My personal projects available on Github.

I had graduated Novosibirsk State University of Inforamtion Technology Department.
Master's dissertation: Santaev P. A, Vlasov A. A, Uramaev M. Sh., Development of software tools for solving problems of nuclear borehole geophysics. Key words: Monte-Carlo statistic method, simulation of passage of gamma-rays, nuclear borehole geophysics. (Link to dissertation).

Hobbies: programming, football, table tennis.

workExperiances.title: Android Engeneer, Android Team Lead, Sibext Ltd, Novosibirsk
